title: Ep. 276: Beauty Bargains and Viral Products with Co-Host Caroline Moss of Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!
itunes:title: Ep. 276: Beauty Bargains and Viral Products with Co-Host Caroline Moss of Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!
itunes:subtitle: The cooling drugstore face mask that’s better than slugging; the bargain hot tool that delivers a salon-like blowout; and an at-home toner that fixes brassy hair—writer Caroline Moss, host of the Gee Thanks, Just Bought It! podcast, is here to share he...
description:
The cooling drugstore face mask that’s better than slugging; the bargain hot tool that delivers a salon-like blowout; and an at-home toner that fixes brassy hair—writer Caroline Moss, host of the Gee Thanks, Just Bought It! podcast, is here to share her best beauty discoveries and discuss why certain products “go viral.” Plus, in Jenn’s Science Corner: making perfumes with artificial intelligence and anti-inflammaging parasites that could benefit your skin. -- Want more of our beauty podcast? Episode Recaps & Products Mentioned: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a "Raise A Wand" Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
